title: Premium Event Planning Platform
description: A visually stunning and highly interactive event planning platform with a modern, premium look.
generation_hints: Implement event creation wizard with react-hook-form and zod
Use zustand to manage event state and guest lists
Add calendar integration for date/time selection
Implement guest list with bulk import from CSV/Excel
Add RSVP tracking with email notifications
Use proper budget calculator with category breakdown
Implement venue search with filtering by capacity/location
Add timeline builder with drag-and-drop activities
Use optimistic UI updates for guest additions
Use proper date/time formatting with date-fns
Use proper ARIA labels for accessibility
Add event template system for quick setup
Use confirmation dialogs for critical actions
